backend.medicalservice.Appointments.services

Interface AppointmentService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AppointmentServiceImpl

    public interface AppointmentService
    This interface defines methods for managing medical appointments.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAppointment(AppointmentEO appointment)
      Adds a new appointment to the system.
      java.util.List<AppointmentEO> getAllAppointments()
      Retrieves a list of all appointments.
      java.util.List<AppointmentEO> getAppointmentByDoctorEmailAndStatus(java.lang.String doctorEmail, java.lang.String status)
      Retrieves a list of appointments for a specific doctor and status.
      java.util.List<AppointmentEO> getAppointmentByPatientEmailAndStatus(java.lang.String patientEmail, java.lang.String status)
      Retrieves a list of appointments for a specific patient and status.

      Retrieves a list of appointments for a specific patient.

    • Method Detail

      • getAllAppointments

        java.util.List<AppointmentEO> getAllAppointments()
        Retrieves a list of all appointments.
        Returns:
        A list of AppointmentEO objects representing all appointments in the system.

      • getAppointmentsByStatus

        java.util.List<AppointmentEO> getAppointmentsByStatus(java.lang.String status)
        Retrieves a list of appointments based on their status.
        Parameters:
        status - The status of appointments to retrieve (e.g., "scheduled", "completed").
        Returns:
        A list of AppointmentEO objects with the specified status.

      • getAppointmentByDoctorEmailAndStatus

        java.util.List<AppointmentEO> getAppointmentByDoctorEmailAndStatus(java.lang.String doctorEmail,
                                                                   java.lang.String status)
        Retrieves a list of appointments for a specific doctor and status.
        Parameters:
        doctorEmail - The email of the doctor for whom appointments are to be retrieved.
        status - The status of appointments to retrieve.
        Returns:
        A list of AppointmentEO objects for the specified doctor and status.

      • getAppointmentByPatientEmailAndStatus

        java.util.List<AppointmentEO> getAppointmentByPatientEmailAndStatus(java.lang.String patientEmail,
                                                                    java.lang.String status)
        Retrieves a list of appointments for a specific patient and status.
        Parameters:
        patientEmail - The email of the patient for whom appointments are to be retrieved.
        status - The status of appointments to retrieve.
        Returns:
        A list of AppointmentEO objects for the specified patient and status.

      • updateAppointment

        void updateAppointment(java.lang.String id,
                       java.lang.String newStatus)
        Updates the status of an appointment.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the appointment to be updated.
        newStatus - The new status to set for the appointment.

      • getAppointmentsByPatientEmail

        java.util.List<AppointmentEO> getAppointmentsByPatientEmail(java.lang.String patientEmail)
        Retrieves a list of appointments for a specific patient.
        Parameters:
        patientEmail - The email of the patient for whom appointments are to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        A list of AppointmentEO objects for the specified patient.

      • addAppointment

        void addAppointment(AppointmentEO appointment)
        Adds a new appointment to the system.
        Parameters:
        appointment - The AppointmentEO object representing the appointment to be added.
